mapper.select: SELECT t1.id FROM de_staff t1 LEFT JOIN mg_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id WHERE t2.device_number = #{deviceNumber} AND ( t1.phone = #{userInfo} OR t1.social_no = #{userInfo} OR t1.uid = #{userInfo} ) limit 1

select t1.project_id projectId,t1.staff_id staffId from de_project_staff t1 inner JOIN ( SELECT * FROM st_nfc_clock_in_record WHERE create_date BETWEEN date_add( date_format( now(), "%Y-%m-%d" ), INTERVAL 8 HOUR ) and date_add( date_format( now(), "%Y-%m-%d" ), INTERVAL 11 HOUR ) ) t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id ORDER BY t1.project_id

select t3.id,t3.video_time videoTime from de_project_lesson t1 LEFT JOIN de_class_lesson t2 on t1.lesson_id = t2.id left join mg_class_chapter t3 on t2.class_id = t3.lesson_id where t3.status = 1 and t1.project_id = #{projectId} order by t3.id
select chapter_id from st_view_record where staff_id = #{staffId} order by id desc LIMIT 1
